lyrics.stanza: What a happy day When I no more could turn away, When Jesus took my heart from the black of night Into the kingdom of His light.
Now my life's begun, The "really life" that's in the Son. No more am I enthralled by earth's empty dreams; Deep in me flows a living stream.
As I turn to Him He fills me with His life within. His life becomes my life in reality; Oh, hallelujah, He's in me!
I just love You, Lord, With other loves, You break the cord. You'll be my life for all eternity; You are the only One for me.
